function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Model simulates infection dynamics based on sars-cov-2 parameter estimates, without considering age stratification.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population-level mobility fluxes obtained from facebook data for good may raise privacy and ethical concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health outcomes modeled based on seir simulations incorporating demographic information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public and private gatherings with reduced capacity and physical distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Domestic travel ban to prevent the spread of the virus between regions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of curfews to limit movement and reduce person-to-person contact during peak transmission times.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data accuracy or completeness in the epidemiological data and npi timelines from the ministry of health and other sources.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or delayed implementation of npis in specific regions of saudi arabia.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public compliance with npis such as isolation, testing, and school closures.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on sars-cov-2 dynamics in gulf states and saudi arabia","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on non-pharmaceutical intervention npi effectiveness in gulf states","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of gulf states in some global npi effectiveness studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imported covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of religious pilgrimage and closure of public venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality in healthcare buildings and hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of onsite energy generation, integrated storage units, or grid connection in healthcare buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low performance of domestic hot water systems in healthcare buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underreporting of impacts related to bacs design and automation levels in healthcare buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak leading to increased pressure on healthcare system and staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building automation and control systems bacs in healthcare sector","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in ventilation system installations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased focus on indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importance of thermal comfort and air exchange","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legionella bacteria due to legislative constraints on water storage","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of building automation and control in case a","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of assessment for water usage and its impact on health in building evaluation tool","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low flexibility and storage in hospitals due to domestic hot water, needing more focus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legislative constraint of water storage due to legionella bacteria.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower initial level of building automation and control in case a, leading to a larger increase in points accumulation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor concentration on domestic hot water in hospitals and healthcare buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low initial level of building automation and control in case a","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low scores in technical domains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of locally generated electricity and storage units","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low score in dynamic envelope for case c","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Older buildings may lack advanced automation and control systems, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrofitting measures may prioritize envelope-targeting instead of building system functionalities, impacting disease control measures.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency may lead to changes in building automation and control systems, affecting the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency leading to a reduction in energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited energy efficiency improvement package targeting specific domains such as domestic hot water and heating","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased flexibility and storage in the building","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased occupant exposure to contagious diseases due to retrofitting and increased maintenance activities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control patterns for domestic hot water systems may lead to the proliferation of legionella bacteria.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency score may lead to changes in building systems and practices that can affect indoor air quality.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in control of distribution pumps and heat generators for energy efficiency may affect the thermal comfort of building occupants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limiting changes to certain building systems due to constraints may result in uneven distribution of energy efficiency improvements, leading to potential performance and health disparities within the building.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in comfort level may lead to higher occupancy and greater spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of demand-based control and automated functions may lead to an increase in aerosol transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved information to occupants may lead to increased social interaction and closer proximity, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
